mapper.select: SELECT , i.item_name, i.item_type, i.category, i.description, i.preview_url, i.resource_url FROM t_user_item ui LEFT JOIN t_item i ON ui.item_id = i.id WHERE ui.user_id = #{userId} AND ui.is_deleted = 0 AND (ui.expire_time IS NULL OR ui.expire_time > NOW()) ORDER BY ui.purchase_time DESC
